feed.title: Lake Superior (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Lake Superior (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:26 a.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: W 16 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 2:05 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:05 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 2:05 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
